descriptions.appearanceDescription: Evelyn is a white Robloxian. They do not really have any notable features.
descriptions.clothingDescription: Black pants, Gray Suit with a black vest on top, black cloth facemask and a Monster Beanie

storyInfo.backstory: Evelyn lived in the city with their parents. They started showing interest in the band when they started middle school, and started playing the Guitar. They enjoyed it, and started their own band with a couple of friends called 'Midnight'. They are the main guitarist.

descriptions.appearanceDescription: Purple Hat shaped like a cat. The ears are a lighter shade of purple.

storyInfo.backstory: Niko's Hat met Thirteen randomly, and the two got along well. She started hanging out at the equation playground with Thirteen, until a mysterious fish approached her about a show. She competed on Fight for the Fish until her elimimation, after which she spent over two years locked away with the other losers.

creatorNotes: Art by by wonderful friend Aleta/Eepy!

descriptions.imageAlt: A Picture of a yellow number 13 being silly

storyInfo.backstory: Thirteen randomly met Niko's Hat one day, and the two got along very well. Thirteen invited Niko's hat over to the Equation Playground, and they started spending a lot of time together. They competed on Fight for the Fish together, Reaching the final 3. However, they still snuck away every night to say hi to Niko's hat after she was eliminated.

descriptions.appearanceDescription: A Pink Rhombus, with a small body in a darker pink colour.
descriptions.personalitySummary: A Upfront and confrontational shape that will speak her mind. Can be seen as Hostile and Violent.

storyInfo.backstory: Red was one of the Heroes of Paradise, working closely with the others to keep it safe. After a big argument with the group, she split off and went on her own, eventually finding herself captured by Blixer and his forces. She was corrupted, and trained to become a loyal fighter of Blixer's army.

creatorNotes: Art by one of my friends :)

descriptions.appearanceDescription: A Black cube with a purple outline and body.
descriptions.clothingDescription: Heavy Boots, Guardian Coat, Pure Armbands, Scarf, Headphones, Wizard Hat, Black Shades
descriptions.personalitySummary: She is friendly with everyone she meets, although she is very guillable.

storyInfo.backstory: Grapefruit was a normal shape born in Paradise. Her parents were taken by the corruption when she was young, and she was taken in by a kind stranger. She got a job at the local library once she started high school. She takes her job seriously but she can sometimes be found half-asleep behind the counter.

creatorNotes: Art by by wonderful friend Aleta/Eepy!

descriptions.appearanceDescription: Brew is a white Robloxian with long, black hair.
descriptions.clothingDescription: Long Purple Scarf, Purple Witches' Hat, Heartbeat Facemask
descriptions.personalitySummary: Social, Extrovert, Kind, Prickly, Rude, Short Sighted, Competitive

storyInfo.backstory: Brew is a loyal inphernal to the Thieves' Den. She grew up in the safer parts of the thieves' den, rarely seeing the violence that the Inpherno had to offer.

descriptions.appearanceDescription: Dye is a white Robloxian with long, black hair.
descriptions.clothingDescription: Very Casual clothing. A Red and gray Hoodie, sweatpants, a red beanie and a red Heartbeat facemask.

storyInfo.backstory: Dye is a loyal inphernal to Playground. She grew up in the crossroads, before moving to the playground.

strengths: A Poisonous trial follows her weapon

descriptions.appearanceDescription: Toxin is a white Robloxian with long, black and green hair.
descriptions.clothingDescription: Dark and professional clothing. A green and black Scientist uniform, a green gas mask and a purple domino crown
descriptions.personalitySummary: Professional, Nice (Friends / Allies), Monotone, Rude (Dislikes), Supportive

storyInfo.backstory: A Loyal Blackrockian. She grew up in Blackrock, growing to love the science-aspect of the faction. They moved to crossroads to learn more about Toxicology, using her knowledge to enchant her assigned gear with a poison effect. She moved back to Blackrock shortly after, becoming a loyal member of Blackrock's Science Department, mostly focused on developing Chemical weapons for Blackrock.
storyInfo.occupation: Toxicologist and Researcher for Blackrock / Phighter

descriptions.appearanceDescription: Null is a white Robloxian with short green hair, and a large set of Lime green wireframe wings
descriptions.clothingDescription: Very Bright clothing. Black pants, a lime green Binary-Digit jacket and a green Heartbeat facemask.

storyInfo.backstory: Null is a notorious hacker from the Thieves' Den. She grew up in a posh part of Thieves' den, growing up around computers. They taught themselves programming and hacking, putting themselves to the ultimate test by hacking into the server of The Flipside, leaking tons of information. She was arrested, but was let go with a warning.

descriptions.appearanceDescription: North is a white Robloxian, with no major appearance details to note.
descriptions.clothingDescription: Very Casual clothing. A Gray striped hoodie and black pants.
descriptions.personalitySummary: A fun and outgoing person. Outgoing, Extroverted, Paranoid

storyInfo.backstory: North is a robloxian living in the Crossroads. From a young age, she had a interest in firearms. Wanting a safe place to fire firearms, she and a couple of friends built Crossroad's first indoor Firing Range.
storyInfo.occupation: Co-Owner of a Firing Range and Weapons Expert

abilities: Has the ability to play Media content on their screen

descriptions.appearanceDescription: Antique TV is a wooden Antique TV Box. Their screen is olive-green.
descriptions.personalitySummary: A Positive and cheery person. They are the sunshine of any room.

storyInfo.backstory: Antique TV and No Parking sign were close friends, spending time together even before the show started. After Fight for the fish started, the two of the stuck together, teaming up.

descriptions.appearanceDescription: No Parking sign is a european no parking sign. They are primarily blue and red on the front.
descriptions.personalitySummary: A positive piece of chaos that knows how to make everyone smile.
descriptions.imageAlt: A Picture of No Parking Sign

storyInfo.backstory: Antique TV and No Parking sign were close friends, spending time together even before the show started. After Fight for the fish started, the two of the stuck together, teaming up.

descriptions.appearanceDescription: Magazine is a orange, brightly coloured magazine with the title 'The Weekly Tangerine'.

storyInfo.backstory: Magazine got an interest in cameras early on. She started messing around with cameras outside of the show, and helped manage the cameras for the show once it started, next to competing.

descriptions.appearanceDescription: Vase of Flowers is a gray vase, with a yellow half-moon symbol on it. She has a bouquet of colourful flowers coming out of the vase.
descriptions.imageAlt: A picture of Vase of Flowers

storyInfo.backstory: Vase of Flowers was always a quiet one. She rarely spoke with the others, and was usually alone. There was one person who managed to befriend her, and became her closest friend. The two of them decided to go camping together, lighting a campfire in the middle of the forest. A forest fire soon started as heavy winds carried embers from the fire away. The forest fire grew massive, and ended up killing her friend. Vase Survived the ordeal, but now lives with guilt over them surviving, and not their friend.

weaknesses: Grieving the loss of their Child

descriptions.appearanceDescription: 552x2 is a Robloxian with light brown skin. They have vines growing over their body, covering their face.
descriptions.clothingDescription: A set of blue-green pants, a solid green torso with a picture of a poorly drawn black and white flower. They wear a witches' hat wrapped with orange leaves, and wooden antlers.

storyInfo.backstory: 552x2 was the guardian of a forest settlement, using their magic to keep the settlement safe. One night, 0vergr0wwth, 2x2's child fell ill and died not long after. This struck 2x2 extremely hard. They started mourning the loss of their child, letting the settlement fall into ruin. Out of her grief, she used her plant magic to 'revive' 0vergr0wwth, moving them around like a puppet on strings with their vines.
storyInfo.occupation: The Guardian of the Forest / Witch

descriptions.appearanceDescription: Stardom is a Robloxian with light brown skin. They wear brightly coloured jester's clothes.
descriptions.clothingDescription: Brightly coloured jester's clothes. Black and red Pants, skirt and jacket, with different symbols painted across. They have stickers of skulls and stars accross the clothes. They have the comedy and tragedy faces sewn into the fabric of their jacket. They have a yellow ribbon accross their chest, and a multicoloured hat.
descriptions.personalitySummary: A chaotic individual where nothing is quite as it seems.

descriptions.appearanceDescription: White Female individual with long, black hair. She has a deep cut across their right eye, often covered up with a facial bandage. She also have a slash across their chest, and has a set of 2 black horns with silver tips.
descriptions.clothingDescription: Gray Pants, black jacket and white shirt, ski goggles, hair pins, belt with chains, bag

storyInfo.occupation: N/A (Canon) / M-2 Maintenance Engineer for the Hadal Blacksite

creatorNotes: Old sona which has been changed to mostly a Pressure OC. Still sometimes use it as a sona.
